ministry_list.name: Missions
ministry_list.description: Northside supports numerous Missionaries who are spreading the gospel throughout the entire world in multiple countries.

ministry_list.name: Children's Ministries
ministry_list.description: We provide multiple activities for your children to enjoy during Sunday and mid-week services.

ministry_list.name: Youth Ministries
ministry_list.description: For teenagers and young adults, we have different groups and community events to get involved in!
We offer a wide variety of Sunday School classes for all ages on Sunday mornings.
ministry_list.name: Sunday School
Northside Christian School
ministry_list.description: Northside Christian School is a ministry of Northside Baptist Church and focuses on using its ministry to deliver doctrinal truth through education.
